item.title: Coined スマホゾ
item.description: 07:55 Tuesday 09 June 2015 JST Right now I”m on the bus and スマホゾ had to be told by the bus driver to move to the back of the bus. I wonder where it will lead in the future. Will these attention-swallowing devices become transparent so we can (attempt to) interact with them and the real world at the same time? Will there be ubiquitous personal locomotion techniques that allow complete sensory immersion in the devices so the real world can be ignored?
